meanings.sent1: The teacher had stricter rules for behavior in her classroom.
meanings.sent2: The company implemented stricter security measures after the data breach.
meanings.sent3: The cat had a stricter diet than the dog, much to the dog's envy.
meanings.sent4: His stricter approach to training turned the team into a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The stricter guidelines ensured everyone followed the same rules.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or acting in close conformity to requirements or principles
meanings.sent1: The new employee had a stricter work ethic than his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The organization's policies became stricter over time to maintain quality standards.
meanings.sent3: The stricter dress code made everyone look more professional.
meanings.sent4: Her stricter adherence to the budget saved the project from going over.
meanings.sent5: The stricter guidelines helped maintain order and efficiency in the workplace.
